description:
Hayuru`s Heart Hybrid Gear is Neros. Hayuru is good a medium-range attacks. Because she can control her 8 swords with her mind her attacks are extremely accurate and deadly at almost any range. The swords obeys Himekawa`s will and soars freely without restriction on the air. It boasts peerless combat strength in middle-range battle, many numbers of magic weapons has been slaughtered by these blades.
Source: masou-gakuen-hxh.wikia.com
name: Himekawa Hayuru (Heart Hybrid Gear)
